Member since: 27 December 2006 Total points: 3,045 (Level 4) Add Contact Block UNDERACHIEVER! I haven't met a fast food worker with brains. Because, if you work in this kind of industry you didn't look too hard for a job. Just a heads up. Nordstroms pays stock people $10 to start, which requires the same brain power. Which is better than the minimum wage Taco Bell pays. 6 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by LL Member since: 14 December 2006 Total points: 600 (Level 2) Add Contact Block EXPLOITED 6 years ago Report Abuse 7% 1 Vote 2 people rated this as good by k_nntang Member since: 11 November 2006 Total points: 2,324 (Level 3) Add Contact Block People who has no life. 6 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by champagn... Member since: 19 November 2006 Total points: 36,238 (Level 7) Add Contact Block a dumb spotty kid 6 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Christopher P Member since: 08 November 2006 Total points: 1,494 (Level 3) Add Contact Block Which one do you mean? There are quite a lot of people working in fast food outlets. The one in the kitchen is probably the chef. I think those standing behind the counter have similar titles to those in a cafe or a restaurant. They are standing waiting for you to place your order so waiter or waitress is the most likely official title. 6 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes 1 person rated this as good by untanuta Member since: 12 October 2006 Total points: 5,641 (Level 5) Add Contact Block Team Member!!!
